AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: First dragonian wild born
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the first dragonians found in the wild.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: First dragonian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the first dragonians found in the wild.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Original dragonian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the fisrt dragonians raised by human hands.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Original dragonian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the fisrt dragonians raised by human hands.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian carefree child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the wild. \n\nBeing carefree in the nature, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to pick wild fruits and communicate with animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian brave child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the wild. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was a brave child and took many adventures the others wouldn't dare to.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian caring child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the wild. \n\nBeing very sympathetic and caring, [PAWN_nameDef] helped others when in need, and benefited from all the helping experiences.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian smart child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the wild. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was smarter and more curious than other children. [PAWN_pronoun] acquired numerous knowledge by asking the tribe's shaman and chief a lot of questions, bothering them to no end.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian abandoned child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was abondoned in the wild, then adopted by a local tribe. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] possesses knowledge of (comparabily) advanced cooking and crafting skills rarely known to the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian cave child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised in the wild. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was particularly interested in caves, and spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood looking for shiny rocks and picking mushrooms. [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to fight insectoids when the need arise.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian vat-grown child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a vat-grown "product" made for one purpose: to be sold to a client. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was force-feeded with knowledge of varying labors, and brain-washed to obey orders. Dragonians like [PAWN_objective] are often sold to military or slavers, and only very few lucky ones are able to avoid such destiny.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian lab child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the result of an experiment aiming to increase the capacity of the race. n\n\The experiment failed to achieve its goal, but [PAWN_nameDef] indeed turned out to be a little smarter. [PAWN_pronoun] showed great interests in scientific and technical topics, but learned very little about the nature.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian idol trainee
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen into an idol training program at young age. \n\nDragonians are natrually fitted as idol: resilient, charming, can sing and dance for hours without getting tired. Particularly talented ones like [PAWN_nameDef] are often chosen into idol training programs, to provide entertainment for people across the galaxy. Even when they failed to pass the program, profits can still be made by selling them to slave merchants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian pet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised as a pet in a luxurious family on a glitterworld. \n\nDespite being cared very well, all [PAWN_nameDef] learned was how to please and obey [PAWN_possessive] master.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian miner child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought to the mines of a tunnel world at very young age, where [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to work. \n\nFortunately, [PAWN_nameDef]'s colleague miners treated [PAWN_objective] warmly, so having a tough childhood didn't bother [PAWN_objective] too much.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian farmer child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was brought to the fields of a farm world at very young age, where [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to work. \n\nDespite the tough labor, the environment of [PAWN_nameDef]'s work place was quite good, so [Pawn_pronoun] often wandered around the field and played with the animals when [Pawn_pronoun] managed to get some free times.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into slavery. [PAWN_pronoun] was sperated from [PAWN_possessive] parents and never knew their face. \n\nAs a dragonian, [PAWN_nameDef] had the potential to become the most priced goods of [PAWN_possessive] master, so [Pawn_pronoun] was treated a bit better than the average slaves. But it was still a tragic childhood, as sleeping in a bedroll was considered luxuious, and nutrient paste was considered a fine meal comparing to the normal kibble-like feedings.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian servant apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was chosen to be trained to become a servant at very young age. \n\nSome rich people on glitterworlds love collecting exalted races as their personal servants, some just want dragonian's beauty or strength. They bought the most talented kids to be trained to become servant, and [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the chosen kids. Although the training was strict, it was still much better than living as a slave.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the warrior of a tribe. \n\nHardened body, years of fighting experience, and dragonian's burst strength, all made [PAWN_nameDef] a force to be reckoned with.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the experienced gatherers of a tribe. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] can easily seperate the edible and non-ediblt parts of wild plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian chief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the chief of a tribe. \n\nAs the chief, [PAWN_nameDef] was the head and the brain of the tribe. [PAWN_possessive] duty was to communicate with the members of the tribe and decide the tribe's next action. It is possible for a dragonian tribe to have multiple chiefs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian shaman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the shaman of a tribe. \n\nAs a shaman, [PAWN_nameDef] was specialized in taking care of wounded and sick tribe members. [PAWN_pronoun] also do some basic cooking sometimes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian beast talker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of handling wild animals in a tribe. \n\nDragonian tribes don't usually keep animals around, because it will make them a bigger target for slavers and bounty hunters. When they need animal products, the animal handlers of the tribe will approach wild animals, calm them down, gather the resources, then move on. The way they calm down wild animals makes people believe they can talk to the animals, hence the nickname of beast talkers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian weaver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the weaver in a tribe. \n\nAlthough the typical cloths worn by dragonian tribals are not complex, they still need to be made. And [PAWN_nameDef] was the one to make them. [PAWN_pronoun] may not be particularly skillful, but [PAWN_pronoun] was still leagues better than most of [PAWN_possessive] tribe mates who don't know crafting at all.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian cave walker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the cave expert in a tribe. \n\nAlthough dragonian tribes don't usually go into the depth of a cave, it's still necessary to hide from enemies or gather resources in a cave sometimes. This is when [PAWN_nameDef]'s expertise come into work. [PAWN_pronoun] can lead [PAWN_possessive] tribe to safely walk the caves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian idol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a famous idol on a glitterworld. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] became popular during [PAWN_possessive] idol training time, and successfully debuted as formal idol. [PAWN_possessive] popularity soon increased further, and it's not long before [PAWN_pronoun] became famous among the fans. Then one day [PAWN_pronoun] suddenly disappeared from the public without a trace. It's unclear how [PAWN_pronoun] ended up on a rimworld like this.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian maid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a maid serving a rich family. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] took care of everything in the house, including cooking, cleaning and tending decorative plants. [PAWN_pronoun] was wierdly adept at combat. Rumors say [PAWN_pronoun] secretly belonged to a shadow organization serving the family.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian butler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a butler serving a rich family. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] took care of everything in the house, including cooking, cleaning and tending decorative plants. [PAWN_pronoun] was wierdly adept at combat. Rumors say [PAWN_pronoun] secretly belonged to a shadow organization serving the family.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian shock trooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a shock trooper in the military. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was bought into military by a contract. [PAWN_possessive] training taught [PAWN_objective] advanced melee combat skills and basic field medic skills. [PAWN_pronoun] fought numerous wars against mechanoids and insectoids.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian spoiled pet
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pet in a luxurious family. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was completely spoiled by [PAWN_possessive] master. [PAWN_pronoun] can not do most jobs, but usefulness wasn't what [PAWN_possessive] master needed. Rumors say [PAWN_nameDef] was more than a pet to [PAWN_possessive] master.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian companian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the companian of someone in a rich family. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was raised as a pet at the begining, but [PAWN_possessive] master fell in love with [PAWN_objective] and eventually made [PAWN_objective] a companian. [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot of skills to help [PAWN_possessive] master ever since.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian body guard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a body guard specialized in protecting VIPs. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was bought by a security company and trained to become one of the best contract body guards. [PAWN_pronoun] was charming enough to be brought to formal meetings， resilient enough to shake off bullet or two, and strong enough to fend off armed assault with bare hands. [PAWN_pronoun] has successfully protected some very influential personnels.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an assitant working in a lab. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] believed the only way to eventually improve the living conditon of [PAWN_possessive] race was to first understand themselves. But [PAWN_possessive] ability was not enough, so [PAWN_pronoun] stayed at the lab, assisting other researchers and learning knowledge along the way.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave laborer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave working various labor jobs. \n\nSlave dealers often think making dragonians work as general labors is a waste of their true value, but as long as the buyer pay them, they don't really care. [PAWN_nameDef] was one of such slave laborers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave prostitute
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave working as prostitute at red light districts. \n\nDragonian's beauty is fairly famous among the brothel frequenters, so their prices are high enough to make their owners a fortune. Unfortunately for [PAWN_nameDef], because of the high prices, [PAWN_possessive] clients often don't go easy on [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] was often physically abused because [PAWN_possessive] healing ability allowed the clients to not worry about leaving scars.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave working as miner on a tunnel world. \n\nDue to dragonian's ability to sense hidden minerals and dig out more usable ores, [PAWN_nameDef] was often assigned to mine the most valuable veins like gold or jade. However, [PAWN_possessive] owner did not appretiate [PAWN_possessive] slow work speed, so [PAWN_pronoun] was often treated poorly.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave working as farmer on a farm world. \n\nDragonians can pick more edible parts from plants, but this is often not the reason they are bought by farm owners. Their hair and milk are very valuable, so it's very lucrative to set up a self-sufficient dragonian farm, where they plant the food they eat themselves, shear themselves and milk themselves. [PAWN_nameDef] belonged to such farm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dragonian slave gladiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave gladiator forced to fight in an arena to provide entertainment for the blood thirsty audiences. \n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was often forced to fight wild beasts with bare hands, but [PAWN_pronoun] managed to survive thanks to dragonian's burst strength and healing ability.
